product_name: Pearl Izumi Elite Thermal Arm Warmers
long_description: With the Pearl Izumi Elite Thermal arm warmers, there's no need to put your favorite short-sleeve jersey in the closet at the end of summer. ELITE Thermal fleece offers warmth and stretch for next-to-skin comfort on long rides. Upper arm scallops interface perfectly with jerseys for full coverage through your range of motion. Anatomic, left and right arm-specific design eliminates bunching. Elastic binding with silicone grippers holds the Pearl Izumi Elite Thermal arm warmers in place. Reflective elements boost your visibility in low light.
short_description: With the Pearl Izumi Elite Thermal arm warmers, there's no need to put your favorite short-sleeve jersey in the closet at the end of summer.
